data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuberan, G., Chakraborty, Rekha Devi, Purushothaman, P., Maheswarudu, G. (2018): Record of the deep sea shrimp Pasiphaea alcocki (Wood-Mason & Alcock, 1891) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pasiphaeidae) from the southwestern coast of India. Zootaxa 4532 (4): 597-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.4.10
